ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: ML.agadir: Al-Magreb (= Morocco), Prov. de Agadir, Agadir; 30°30'N 09°40'W

ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.24a: Azores, Terceira, E coast, Praia da Vitória, S part of northern beach; 38°43'N 27°04'W; sandy beach; shore collecting; 2.x.1979
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.024: Canary Islands, S of Lanzarote; 28°48'N 13°49'W; depth 39 m, sand with calcareous algae; van Veen grab; 15.v.1980
Sta.MAU.059: off Mauritania; 19°05'N 16°39'W; depth 110 m, small catch, hermitcrabs, flatfish; 2.4 m Agassiz trawl; 12.vi.1988
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.007: Canary Islands, S of Fuerteventura, Punta de Jandia; 27°48'N 14°24'W; depth 2000 m, plain with pteropod ooze; anchor dredge; 24.viii.1977
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.065: Cape Verde Islands, W of Boa Vista, SW of Ilhéu Calheta do Velho; 16°10'N 22°58'W; depth 39 m, very fine, yellow calc. sand; van Veen grab; 27.viii.1986
Sta. MAU.030: Off Mauritania; 18°49'N 16°24'W; depth 36 m, muddy grey sand, tubeworms macroforaminifera; Van Veen grab; 9.vi.1988
